sentences.en: Aliquot 10μ l of the master mix for each DNA to be analyzed into a reaction tube.
sentences.cn: 将酵素反应混合液取10μl分装 至每管要被分析DNA至反应管.

sentences.en: For the request to aliquot a unit of blood for small volume transfusion.
sentences.cn: 申请将一单位血液分成小单位时使用.

words.tran_cn: 不能整除；[数] 除不尽的数

trans.tran_en: of, signifying, or relating to an exact divisor of a quantity or number

trans.tran_cn: （尤指化学实验的）试样，整除数
